summary: A suite of unit tests that validates the decoder‑only conditional generation variant of the InstructBLIP model, covering its forward interface, hidden state outputs, embedding handling, configuration loading (including vision‑QFormer text settings), pretrained initialization, gradient retention, fast initialization serialization, and weight‑tying consistency.
business_intent: Guarantee the robustness and correctness of the InstructBLIP decoder‑only generation model for production use in tasks such as image captioning, visual instruction following, and other multimodal generation applications.
